summary: !!!New concept of dungeon!!! A detailed, medium-sized dungeon directly located in Tamriel Worldspace. The dungeon develops beneath Whiterun. Inside there it won't rain and it will be pitch dark, dungeon ambient sounds replace exterior sounds. Complete a quest and become the owner of an incredibly dynamic hideout room&#33
descriptionHtml:
[font=Impact][center][b][color=#FF0000][size=6]NO-LOADING-SCREEN DUNGEON
[size=4][size=5]by DavideMitra[/size][/size][/size][/color][/b][b][color=#FF0000][size=6][/size][/color][/b][/center][b][color=#FF0000][size=6]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YMoVcWg.jpg[/img]

[center]- MAIN FEATURES -[/center][/size][/color][/b][/font][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b]
Beneath the streets of Whiterun is located the first Skyrim dungeon that is directly located in Tamriel Worldspace. I'm talking about Natural Caves!
A medium-sized underground cave system that meets almost every spec a real dungeon should have: no rain clipping through the "rocky roof", no sunlight illuminating the "indoor" complex (no sunlight=no sun damage=100% vampire friendly!), pitch darkness (from now on, Skyrim torches become useful), silence surface sounds and hear cave ambient sounds...
Natural Caves is a dungeon that doesn't need many presentation words. It's just something new you never tried before![/b][/font][/size]




[color=#FF0000][font=Impact][size=6][center]- OTHER FEATURES -[/center][/size][/font][/color]
[line][list]
[*][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]The dungeon features a specific quest that tests your scouting and orienteering abilities. Complete the quest, then become the owner of a completely custom player room...the most dynamic cave home you've ever seen before! (everything is interactable...for instance, open the treasury chest and check its content)[/size][/font][/b]
[/list][line][list]
[*][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b]Depending upon your decision, it is possible to fight against trap/enemy hybrids: the Nightstalkers. Impaled skeletons who won't move (guess why) but will hit you with ranged lethalÂ  magical attacks.[/b][/font][/size]
[/list][line][list]
[*][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b]Forge Glass-quality special armor sets, Daedric-quality iron/steel weapons, an invisible light helm, faster arrows, etc.[/b][/font][/size][/size][/font][/b]
[/list][line][list]
[*][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b]The only safe place in Skyrim to hide from someone: interior navmeshes are missing, so the cave system is the best solution to hide from guards, or from dragons. Are you an assassin? Are you a thief? Are you a level 4 vampire? Natural Caves is the only place in Skyrim where they will never catch you![/b][/font][/size]
[/list][line][list]
[*][size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b]Your alchemic paradise: Create powerful poisons with Jarrin Roots (you can harvest 3 respawnable samples!!!). Find and harvest dozens of mushrooms of various species. Now fear and frenzy poisons are very powerful. Etc.[/b][/font][/size]
[/list][line][list]
[size=4][font=Comic Sans MS][b]Your mining paradise: Lots of ore veins are waiting for you. They will be very useful if you intend to craft mod-related armor or weapons.[/b][/font][/size][/list][line][list]
[*][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Experience the incredibly immersive sensation of people/beasts/trees that are really moving over your head while you're inside of a Skyrim dungeon!!![/size][/font][/b]
[heading][/heading][heading][/heading][color=#FF0000][font=Impact][size=6][b][center]- WARNINGS -[/center][/b][/size][/font][/color][heading][/heading][*][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Before starting the mod, please have a look to the readme and to the other document located in the same folder. It is really[/size][/font][/b][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4] important, because it explains essential things you can't miss.[/size][/font][/b]
[/list][line][list]
[*][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Since there's a script that deals with vampirism...don't worry: Dawnguard is compatible. Ironically, Open Cities Whiterun is not compatible (100% sure about that)[/size][/font][/b][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4].[/size][/font][/b]
[/list][line][list]
[*][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]The mod has been already cleaned with TES5Edit: it is 100% safe to use! ;)[/size][/font][/b]
[/list]

[color=#ff0000][font=Verdana][b][size=6][font=Impact][size=6][b][center]- CREDITS -[/center]

[/b][/size][/font][/size][/b][/font][font=Tahoma][color=#fff2cc][size=4]This project wouldn't be possible without the help of those great persons:

Thanks to [b]FRANKFAMILY and LEVIONTE[/b] for their brilliant anti-sun damage script.

Here's a link to[b] FRANKFAMILY's[/b] Nexus profile.
[url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/2531318-frankfamily/]FrankFamily[/url]
Here's a link to [b]LEVIONTE's[/b] Nexus profile.
[/size][/color][/font][/color][size=4][url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/16520954-levionte/]Levionte[/url][/size]

[color=#00B050]
[/color]
[color=#00B050][font=Arial Black][size=5]!!! HAVE FUN !!![/size][/font][/color]
author: DavideMitra
